body.name: Disposable Face Mask, Pack of 50
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 38 mins
features: This is a general use face mask.
This mask is not intended for medical use, and not proven to reduce the transmission of disease.
Pack of 50 masks. Each box contains 5 wrapped inner packs of 10 masks each for a total of 50 masks. These masks should be disposed of after each use.
3-layers folded, concealed plastic nose bridge, and elastic mounting ear bands.
body.description: R-Collar Disposable Face Mask, Pack of 50. This mask is not intended for medical use, and not proven to reduce the transmission of disease. These masks should be disposed of after each use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Very, VERY, poor quality masks. Definitely not medical grade but you get what you pay for. These masks tear very easily and feel paper thin but are perfect for indoor use. I have seasonal allergies and get congested and wearing these tends to help although these probably won't stop the spread of any diseases.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the cost
reviews.reviewText: The masks run a little smaller lengthwise than other masks, so they fit a little more snug than other brands. But this actually works really well for household members that wear glasses as it really helps to keep them from fogging up.Mask quality is good and the material did not have an odor like some others I have tried. They feel very thin but this is expected of this type of material. Like all other disposable masks, the bands are glued on so it is always a good idea to treat them carefully. Excessive pulling or stretching can cause the glued area to rip away from the mask.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality, Great Fitting, One Time Use Mask - Makes life Easier, even in these times.
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure about buying masks, wearing masks or what masks to buy. I looked through several options online, even tried a few types of masks, and someone recommended I look at these masks. I liked the price and the simplicity of the design, so figured it was worth a buy. They are awesome! Best masks I have bought and made it easier to feel alright running out on errands. I know they are safe, effective and simple to use. They fit great and I can breath easily in them. Shipping was incredibly fast too. I will be buying them again. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Price but....
reviews.reviewText: Got these @ a really really good price. The are durable and I really like....until....I realize that the whole household(2adults 2teenagers) was complaining about the back of our ears hurting. The mask are great, but a little small. The are great for short term use, but not for wearing a long time....they become uncomfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A W E S O M E
reviews.reviewText: A W E S O M E

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Same Useless Painter's masks
reviews.reviewText: If anyone out there actually believes these little "dust masks" stop Covid virus, or ANY virus, from being inhaled into your respiratory system, you're sadly mistaken. We are all being lied to. Initially, Fauci came out and told the truth about them, recommended that we don't even bother with them, but he was shut up by politicians. This paper mask mght stop some dust in the air, but it's totally ineffective in a Pandemic for stopping pathogenic viruses. Ask any medical worker, they'll tell you. If it's not an N-95 Surgical Mask, you're wasting your money. And exposing yourself to Covid Of course nobody will publicize this information because Surgical grade masks are made in China, and they're NOT sharing them. The limited supply that does make it into our country are immediately scarfed up for hospital employees and first responders. You can't even find the real ones online anymore! BUT, I still purchased them because it shuts up the uninformed who INSIST we use a mask. This is the biggest lie, the biggest scam ever perpetuated on the American public. It's designed to give you some sense of control, security and hope. If they worked, why is Covid still rampant out there? Why did the religious paper mask wearers still get sick? (It's because they DON'T work to stop virus. Plain and simple.} Thanks though, for the low price. At least I can get my shopping done if I have one of these shams strapped to my beak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I have ordered this product 4 times now, and the quality has been really inconsistent. The first pack was flimsy, the second pack was a little better. My third pack of 50 worked great and fit really well around my face, but the new pack I just opened is flimsy, the nose wire doesn't bend well, and the loops break easily. I'm a teacher and need to wear these masks daily, so this inconsistent quality does not work for me and I will not purchase this product again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durability and comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a min. Purchase of 3. I am happy with the materials. The nose fitting is excellent ( do not fog your glasses) and the fabric feels heavy duty.I love it alot. Comfortable enough to wear all day without the inside getting all worn out that I need to exchange it. awesome mask by far.
